'''Marikoth Korianthil''' was a knight of [[House Korianthil]] in [[Evermeet]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.History: Marikoth had fought in all the [[elven]] wars on [[Faerûn]] for centuries before deciding to settle in Evermeet. There, he became the informal second-in-command of the Evermeet army, after [[Keryth Blackhelm]].
document_data.Personality: Marikoth was a quiet individual with an expression of continual wariness.
